EmailTemplate.name: Follow up from MBO Partners. (1342714636.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Follow up from MBO Partners. (1342714636.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Dear Samuel , As a courtesy, I wanted to follow up on the voicemail I left you. My name is Nicolette Taylor and I’ll be responsible for answering any questions you may have and providing you an overview of our services. I truly apologize for missing our scheduled call on 7/9, for some reason the appointment never synced to my calendar and I just realized that I missed the call with you when going through my list on contacts. If you are interested in hearing more about our services, you may easily book a time that is convenient for you to chat using my online schedule <https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK>. You may also watch a short video about who we are on YouTube <http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zKDzwSTmGv4&hd=1>. You may also look at some of the stories from indepdenents <http://info.mbopartners.com/meet-the-independents.html> who use MBO Partners. I look forward to speaking with you, Nicolette
